name: Suicide Watch (LD39)
description:
Made for LD39

Theme : Running out of power

Point and Click game where you try to save your battery and your suicidal friend from dying. Choose which program to close to cut your battery drain and keep in contact with your friend while your contact drives to rescue him.

Controls : Mouse

Credits :

Programming & SFX : MrJotubes (https://twitter.com/MrJotubes)

Art & Assets : BdManiak

Other Assets :

Cafe Latte Textures by vector-eps.com

Royalty-free assets from Photofiltre 7 photofiltre.com

"News of Sorrow" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Long Note Three" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Lightless Dawn" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Quinn's Song: First Night" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Shadowlands 1 - Horizon" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Memories" Bensound (www.bensound.com)

Musics licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Made with Construct 2 https://www.scirra.com/construct2

SFX created with BFXR & a mic !
